verbose_text: In this study, the endogenous anti-inflammatory protein ANXA1 31 was found downregulated in both pathogenic IBV ck/CH/LDL/97I and AIV H9 infected groups at 7dpi and in all virus infected groups at 12 dpi, suggesting that the decreased expression of ANXA1 may be associated with the inflammatory phenotype during the course of avian respiratory viruses infections.
